title: Upgrade grep tool to use ignore crate (ripgrep libs)

logs.msg: HIGH PRIORITY. Current grep tool uses regex crate with manual async recursion, hardcoded ignore list (.git, target, node_modules). Replace with ignore crate which is already in Cargo.toml but unused. Benefits: automatic .gitignore support, parallel walking, binary detection, much faster. See ai/design/dependency-upgrades.md
